Items.Title: Oversight - Safe staffing ratios in hospitals
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Safe staffing ratios in hospitals

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a study by the department of health and mental hygiene on the causes of rising wait times in emergency departments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Study by the dept of health and mental hygiene on the causes of rising wait times in emergency departments.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation requiring the New York State Department of Health to establish safe staffing ratios to ensure all acute care facilities and nursing homes meet minimum safe staffing standards for nurses and all direct care staff.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Safe Staffing for Quality Care Act (A.1532/S.3330)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation requiring hospital emergency departments to improve their services to better inform patients of their potential wait time and other care options
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring hospital emergency departments to improve their services to better inform patients of their potential wait time and other care options.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to information about health care services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
